QuestData.Title: Plight of the Blackfeather
QuestData.Description:
<The ravenbear frantically gestures and points down the path.
It seems he wants you to follow him.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the frightened ravenbear to the Blackfeather chieftain.
QuestData.RewardText: Caw?$B$B<The ravenbear chieftain seems preoccupied with the gathering of reagents for some sort of ritual. Perhaps you could help him?>
